location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Captain Arthur William Stiffe

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Captain Robinson's assistance in attempting to get gun-boats and coal to the Gulf and reporting his hopes that mail steamers will soon be able to return to Muskat.The letter goes on to report on progress in building a telegraph house and expressing Pelly's regrets that it was not built closer to the sea.
